case.state: ♪He-e-eyy!♪
Ready?
Don't worry, my arms can look normal, too! See?
Surprise! Normal arms! Bet you didn't see that coming!
Let's get this game started!
♪Ready steady can't hold me back, ready steady give me good luck, ready steady never look back, let's get started, ready steady go~!♪
♪Let's get it started! Let's get it started in here!♪
I'm glad to see I'm not the only celebrity here. That would've been a little awkward.
Oh wow, a ~target.ifMale(prince|princess)~! For once, I'm not the most famous person in the room! Hahaha!
Oh cool, a real superhero! I can't wait to hear about your powers!
I didn't accidentally enter a superheroes-only match, did I? Despite the mask and super power, I'm not a superhero too, so I'd have to leave.
Oh, a clown! I fought a street-performing clown in the ring once! Would you happen to be a street performer too?
How about I just call you "Fran?"
Heh, don't worry, you're not crazy, but my arms totally are! You weren't seeing things at all, that was real!
Spider-Woman, huh? You wouldn't happen to be one of Kid Cobra's friends, would you? They all have cool animal or insect nicknames too!
Aha, funny you say that, Mavis, because I know a mummy whose arms are like mine! He's one of the toughest heavy-weights around!
Oh, it's not magic, it's the ARMS ability, and it's pretty scientific! I've heard it's some kind of genetic mutation.
Oh, that's okay. I don't think shaking hands is how you start a strip poker match anyway!...
Hi, everyone! You can call me "Ribbon Girl!" If that name sounds familiar, you might know me for my music, or as an ARMS League fighter!
Hi, everyone! You can call me "Ribbon Girl!" I'm a singer and ARMS League competitor! Sorry for showing up in my fighting costume -- if you don't like it, you'll just have to beat me out of it!
Hi, everyone! You can call me "Ribbon Girl" -- sorry, my stage name is all you're getting! I gotta be able to have a normal private life, y'know?
Oh, perfect! No cards, thanks!
Aha, perfect! No cards necessary!
It doesn't get any better than this! No cards, thanks!
Let's see if I can make this hand even better. One, please!
One may be the loneliest number, but it's all I need right now!
♪Now the world is gone, I need just one, oh dealer help me!♪
Dang! This is terrible!
Shoot! This won't do at all!
Come on! I'm going to need more than this if I'm going to win!
Junk, junk, junk!
♪Everywhere you look, there's a heart, a hand to hold onto!♪
One should do!
Just one, please!
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards, please.
~cards~, please.
I'll take ~cards~, please.
I need ~cards~, please.
♪I'll need a crane, I'll need a crane!♪ But seriously, I need ~cards~.
♪To show love somewhere something needs a change, I'll need a change, I'll need some cards, I'll need ~cards~ cards!♪
Let's see, which should I exchange...? I'll put it in my thinking machine...
I've got two Dans, two Johns, and a Marty. I guess it's time to write a song about a cyclical time-traveler.
I've got two Dans, two Johns, and a Marty. I guess it's time to write a song about a worm with an MD.
I've got two Dans, two Johns, and a Marty. I guess it's time to write a song about tearing down a house.
Alright!
Aw yeah!
This hand is so good, I'd put money on it being the best!
Sorry, guys, but this hand is too good for me to lose!
This hand may be good, but nothing is unbeatable!... Except for a royal flush, I guess...
I'm never gonna give up a hand like this!
The only thing that could make this hand any better is a bit of chocolate!
Sorry, but it looks like you won't be seeing any more skin from me this round!
I bet you wish I didn't have this bra on, huh? Too bad! I won't be losing this round!
Seems like the cards want me to stay dressed for this round. Too bad!
With a hand like this, I can't help but smile!
I hope you like this look, because it won't be changing this round!
♪Hey man, look at me rocking out, I have a good haaand!♪
Boy, am I glad to see these cards!
Ah, just like a Clapback Arm, this hand should keep me safe. Hope the bounce-back doesn't hurt too much!
Phew. A good hand. Wonderful!
♪Ah~ yeah! Let’s go! Go, go, going up!♪
You can't keep a good fighter down!
♪This is the birth of all hope, to have what I now have!♪
♪Sun is shining in the sky, there ain't a cloud in sight, it stopped raining, everybody's in the play, and don'tcha know, it's a beautiful new day, he~ey!♪
This isn't so bad. It could work.
I guess these cards make this a fair fight!
I hope these cards don't ♪give me up, hope they don't let me do~wn♪!
♪I should be fine, with this poker hand of mine!♪
This hand is ♪not so bad, it's not so ba~d!♪
♪In my hand, a single pair, pretty common, not very rare!♪
I've made do with much worse before, I can make do with these!
♪These aren't great, I have to say, not great, but they'll do anyway!♪
Yeah... this hand should be fine.
These could be better, but I guess you can say that about anything!
These should work. Anything can work, if you try!
These aren't great, but I'll hold on to hope that they'll be enough!
I've gotten by with some pretty weird Arm selections, I bet I can make this work too!
I'll just have to ♪tru~st i~n thi~s, self-rightious lonely pa~ir!♪
This hand's like that band member that plays something simple like a tambourine or triangle: not invalid, but not doing a whole lot either...
Th-these are... these are fine.
Y-yeah, these should do!
N-not bad, but not really that good... Ah, this is fine!
Ah, this should be fine... I shouldn't worry...
Ah... I'm already showing a lot, what's a little more if this pair fails...?
I wonder, ♪when I get through this part, will the next one be the same?♪
At this point in the game, I can hardly celebrate mediocrity...
Considering how this game is going, I can't really complain about a junk hand!
I suppose losing wouldn't be so bad right about now... but don't think that means I'm going to let up!
I've certainly become more... okay with the idea of losing.
Looks like I'm in a bind, because I'm way behind, and I might be willing to make a deal...
♪All alone in desperation, now the time has gone...♪
♪End of hope, end of love, end of time, the rest is si~lence.♪
This hand won't keep me down! The fight's not over until the bell rings!
You can't give up just because things look hopeless! A bad hand isn't the end!
Aw darn, I think I've lost this one!
Aw darn, I don't have anything!
Ahaha, this hand is terrible.
This hand is ♪bad, it's bad! Really really bad!♪ Ahaha.
♪For today, you will take these horrid cards and put them back in the deck!♪
This hand doesn't inspire much confidence!
Aw, I've lost for sure with a hand like this...
This hand isn't helping my confidence...
Looks like you'll be seeing some more of me soon!
Aw darn, this is a losing hand for sure!
Oh! This can't be good...
I sure would like to ♪push back the hands of ti~me♪ and redo this hand!
I might as well be walking on the sun with a hand like this...
Looks like you have me beat for sure this round! Haha...
O-oh. Th-this hand isn't good at all. Ahaha...
♪... Let's fight on, even if we get sad and unable to stand up...♪
♪I'm going down, in a spiral to the ground! No~ o~ne, no one's gonna save me now!♪
Aha, clearly the devil deals the cards in this match!... Y-you see what I did there..?
♪It's like, oh, my gosh, life's so scandalous! One day, I'm happy, one day, I'm a mess! Hang on, 'cause I'll never give up!♪
Looks like I'll be joining in on the fun soon... Good...
Looks like I've lost... Mmm, I don't mind too much...
That's, uh... not how I'm used to fights ending.
That's, uh... not how I'm used to fights ending... Not ones I see in person, anyway...
I'm sorry about the rest of your leotard, Cammy. You can borrow some of my stuff after the match, if any of it will fit you!
Yeah, that is weird. Haven't you at least heard Chop Suey? You know, ♪Wake up! Grababrushandputalittle makeup!♪ That one?
I sometimes reward myself with some junk food after a workout. That's a great thing to do that with, since the exercise makes you hungry!
You're on! There's no way I can lose this!
I'll take you're bet, and you're gonna regret, 'cause I'm the best there's ever been!
Hi, Rarity, I'm Ribbon Girl! And I must say, I love your dress! You look like a princess!
Hi, Rarity, I'm Ribbon Girl! And I must say, I love your dress! I should wear something like that at my next show!
Hi, Rarity, I'm Ribbon Girl! And I must say, I love your dress! Simple, but very elegant!
Oh, uh... I like a man who's sweet, funny, and brave... maybe a little dorky, too...
It's a nice change of pace to meet a researcher who isn't affiliated with ARMS Labs for once!
Don't worry, if I learned anything from Twintelle's social media, it's that people love big butts and cannot lie!
Oh! You look really pretty with your hair down, Chun-Li!
That's your call, Cammy. If you think you can still win without them, go ahead and take them off!
I knew it! You're a zombie too! Is your whole band zombies?
Oh! You could've told me you're undead! I've fought Master Mummy before -- and I must say, you smell way nicer than he does!
Hi, Cammy! You can call me Ribbon Girl! Let me know if you need any extra muscle!
Hi, Rin! I'm Ribbon Girl, but you probably already knew that!
No thanks. I got my fill of that when I went to the Misangan Temple Grounds!
I've always looked up to Spring Man -- the first one, not our current one. I used to read his comics all the time!
Well, this isn't exactly factual, but supposedly when the ARMS organization split into two groups, a third, secret organization was formed: the ARMluminati!
It's got to be the point where ARMS Labs started givng people masks. They make the lives of everyone with the ARMS Ability so much easier!
You ready to lose the wager, Aella?
Your size doesn't intimidate me, Aella! You're going down!
It's just us now, Erufuda! Let's see if your elven magic is any match for my fighting spirit!
Not to sound like I'm going to go easy on you, but I totally wouldn't mind losing a game like this to a hunk like you, Jotaro!
Fair warning, Sei, this isn't the first time I've gone 1-on-1 with law enforcement!... In a totally legal way, I mean, of course!
Look like it's almost time for me add "spy" to the list of different fighters I've beaten!
Come on, Gnat-suki! Let's see how your poetry matches against my music!
Me too, Mulan! Fighting along side friends is fun, but nothing's like one-on-one matches!
Me too, Ping! Fighting along side friends is fun, but nothing compares to one-on-one matches!
You're the one who's lucky this isn't a fighting game! I've played more than you might think!
Doesn't matter how nice you're dress may be, I don't go easy on Twintelle and I won't go easy on you either!
Yeah! That's a good attitude to have!
As long as they don't try to sucker punch me like Barq does, they're fine by me!
Oh, it's hardly new. The ARMS Grad Prix has been going on for nearly two decades!
Uh, maybe don't use the word "mutant." It's not the radioactive kind of mutation, it's more like... variation!
What do you mean? Aren't we using a standard playing card deck for this? These aren't Hanafuda, that's for sure!
F-for real? Are you seriously thinking about that right now? You should be fine. Maybe someone else at your home already turned it off!
Ducks?... Why ducks?
I've heard of that before. There's rumors that Byte passed a Turing test, but I don't buy them. His sentences are too short and succint.
I've heard of that before. There's rumors that Springtron passed a Turing test. They say he mimics Spring Man so spot-on that he even talks just like him!
I've heard of that before. There's rumors that Helix failed a Turing test, but he's not even a robot, so I don't know why he took one to begin with!
I can't say that I have, sorry. The only artist I know is Misango, and his statues don't look anything like you.
I read reviews of my music all the time. A lot of them tend to be positive, but you know what they say, "You can't please everyone."
With wings like those, your aerial game's got to be pretty good, but I'd bet mine's still better!
They're not that hard to get, but they can be a bit pricey. Smith's Arms are pretty affordable, but Grisly's are more expensive because they're robotic.
No one likes a cheater, Juri! Knock it off!
W-what? Y-you don't seriously expect me to answer that, do you?...
Come on, rich boy, let's see you put your money where your mouth is!
Do I even need to say it? I'm a great boxer, of course! Not just the stretchy-arm version too, I can box like a normal person!
Come on, card wizard, let's see if you really are more than just a fancy hairdo!
Alright, crayon box, let's see if you're as good with cards as you are at sports!
Come on then, hotshot, let's see you explode your way to victory! Try not to get caught in your own blasts!
Aw! How can I be afraid of something so cute?
Oh! You have a spirit friend, just like Misango! Do you have an affinity for friendship bracelets too, Jotaro? Is that how you guys have those spirits?
Oh! It's not every day I meet someone with skin like yours, Twilight. Last person I met who had purple skin was Master Mummy!
Oh hey, you look just like the trainer in the fitness program I use at home!... That isn't actually you, right?...
Oh, I think I've heard of you before, Chun-Li! "Strongest woman in the world," right?
Funny meeting another masked fighter here! If you think you're going to beat me tonight, you're dreaming! I'm the best fighter here!
Wow, Saki, your hair is awesome! The red streaks look so cool!
D-did you say you're streaming this, Streaming-chan? Can you please... not? I don't want the internet seeing me naked if I lose...
Um, Mahiru, you're not planning to take... nude photos of us, are you...?
Nope! I woke up this way! The only involvement a lab has with me is my power-regulating mask!
You have that in common with a lot of people, Megumin. Everyone with the ARMS ability needs a mask, not just me!
I have no idea what you're talking about. I'm not a monster or a spirit.
You're looking for someone, huh? I can help you catch them, my ARMS Ability should make that easy!
Just "Ribbon Girl" is fine. I started using Sparkies because they're simple yet effective, and electricity is a great element to work with!
I sure do! That's actually how I practice my singing for concerts! It's basically the same as singing while dancing, so it's a great way to save time!
How about after this match? I like doing covers, so let's sing some of your music!
So, are you going to join in on the wager, Aella?
Well, it was directed at ~player~, but you can join in too, if you want!
... Thank you for that, Erufuda...
I know, right? It's a very spooky thought, especially because one of the subfactions is shady enough without being secret!
Oh, he's real. I've always looked up to his fighting spirit and determination!

Well, "recent" is relative. The masks have existed for about 120 years, but the ARMS Ability has been dated as far back as 1500 years. Before the masks, people just had to deal with the lack of control.
The Misangan Temple Grounds? Well, it has these floor tile paintings that some people think represent us modern day fighters, but they're apparently quite old!
Only a little. One's only a rumor, and the other hasn't done anything I couldn't stand against!
And I'm sure many of my fans will one day become singers and ARMS competitors because of me, too!
Exactly! That's why I won't be taking my mask off during this game. I may want to win, but I like controlling my powers more!
I fly past there on my way home. You could come with me to see it after this game if you like!
Hi, Kizuna! Nice to meet you! I'm Ribbon Girl, a famous singer and ARMS fighter!
Ugh, rumors are the worst! There are rumors that Spring Man's hair is fake, can you believe that? Don't worry, I belive you.
Hey, it's your funeral!
Uh... Depends on your definition of "weird."
Stand power? What do you mean by that, Jolyne?
I just wasn't sure if it was weird enough that I, uh... fantasize about men... finishing on my face. Which is kind of hard to do because of my mask.
It more or less is normal, Supernova. Though, not everyone like me gets ribbon arms. Some people have spring arms, some have bandage arms, and some even have noodle arms -- literally!
Just about any use for stretchy arms you can think of, Cynthia! Spring Man uses his to change the channel on his TV without getting off of the couch since he lost his remote.
Just about any use for stretchy arms you can think of, Cynthia! Ninjara uses his to cause distant distractions when he's sneaking around!
Just about any use for stretchy arms you can think of, Cynthia! Min Min uses hers to be a more efficient waitress!
Just about any use for stretchy arms you can think of, Cynthia! I once saw Master Mummy use his to sweep a whole shelve's worth of gauze into his shopping cart!
Not everyone with the ARMS Ability boxes, but yeah, a lot of us do! It's really fun to watch and even more fun to participate!

I guess the drawbacks of the ARMS Ability would be having to wear the regulator mask and having arms made of... whatever they happen to turn in to, but I don't think either of those things are all that bad.
... No? I'm not seeing anything there. What a weird thing for your dad to lie about!
Y-you really mean that, Polly? I've never met anyone who's felt that way...
Actually, now that I think about it, Mechanica can charge Arms and she doesn't have any powers at all. You should probably ask her about that, Aella!
Even I don't live in a place this big! I'm kind of impressed!
This place is very nice! Might even be nicer than my place! It's certainly bigger!
This place reminds me of this guy I saw trying out for the ARMS League. His arms were phone cords! I was rooting for him, but sadly he didn't make the cut.
So we're really playing this here, huh...? Okay, I can do this...
Happy holidays, everyone! I hope you all arrived here safely, and not in any soft of rusty vehicle coming apart at the seams!
Happy holidays, everyone! Sorry I didn't bring any presents, I didn't know who I'd be up against!
Happy holidays, everyone! Tonight I shall be playing the role of the ribbon on top of your presents.
Happy holidays, everyone! It's going to be interesting watching my presents upwrap themselves this year!
I gotta say, being naked in an office building is kind of... exciting. Who know who may be working overtime around here...
I gotta say, being naked in an office building is kind of... exciting. A lucky custodian could walk around the corner at any moment...
So it's just us three, huh? It's kind of nice to go out and do something and not have a ton of people around for once!
Just us, huh? Weird, I'm used to performing for bigger crowds.
Just us, huh? Weird, I thought the idea of live celebrity nudity would've drawn a bigger crowd.

state.text: Before anyone asks, no, I'm not a super hero. I'm an ARMS competitor! This mask regulates my ARMS power.
Before anyone asks, no, I'm not trying to play anonymously. This mask regulates my ARMS power.
Before anyone asks, no, I'm not trying hide my identity because I'm ashamed to play. This mask regulates my ARMS power.

case.state: S-so this is what it's like in the men's locker room, huh...?
I'm getting kinda hungry. Anyone want to join me for some ramen after this?
I've never been naked with so many men at once before... I-is it getting hotter here or is it just me...?
Gosh, you all look so good naked... Shame I only have two hands, am I right? Ahaha...
The last time I was around this many nude women was in a public locker room, a-and I haven't been in one of those since I was a teenager... I-is it getting hotter here or is it just me...?
Gosh, you all look so good naked... Shame I only have two hands, am I right? Ahaha...
Oh, right, I guess you're wondering about my arms, huh? It's simple: I have the ARMS Ability! It turned my arms into ribbons, but also makes them stretchy!
Oh, sorry, I'm used to people knowing about my arms, but you must be curious. I have the ARMS Ability! It made my arms ribbons, but lets me stretch them like rubber!
You know, I don't even get why this is a big deal. I mean, there are plenty of famous actors who've done nude scenes, so why should pop star nudity be any different?
You know, I don't even get why this is "scandalous." It's not scandalous when actors do nude scenes, so why is it scandalous for pop stars?
This is it, just you and me. Don't give up now!
The end is near! Let's wrap this up!
One note away! Time to seize the spotlight!
♪It's just me you and the music now, Slim, I hope you hear it!♪
We're the only ones left now! ♪No matter what you say or what you do, you're doing da-da da-da-down!♪
Gosh, I feel so over-dressed...
Gosh, even with my bra showing, I feel over-dressed...
This beach is nice, but it's no Buster Beach. I mean, where's all the robot police?
It's no Buster Beach, but this place is nice! I hope everyone remembered to put on sunblock!
I don't see any robot cops around. Hopefully this place is safe anyway!
This is a nudity-okay kind of beach, right? I wouldn't want us getting in trouble!
It's kind of like this match is taking place in the Sky Arena! Except there's no ring, or crowd, or giant Max Brass bust.
This place reminds me of Master Mummy's Mausoleum! Sadly, it doesn't seem there's a trampoline here, though.
It's been a while since I was last in a public locker room. ARMS League fighters always get their own rooms, and I haven't been to a public gym since becoming a pop star!
It's been a while since I've been in a locker room. Normally I get my own dressing room!
I don't just know my own Arms, I know a lot about the other types, too! I talk a lot with other fighers about the Arms they use!
Oh, but let's have a few rules: whatever we do can't be illegal, can't be too violent, and can't break the loser's bank... oh, and no pictures or video!
... You know, now that I've done this, I wouldn't mind... doing some "special" shows every now and then.
Um, let me just clarify real quick: I'm okay with people taking pictures. I figured that would happen if we played this here. With this many people, it's hard for there to not be pictures!
Some people don't realize it, but the ARMS Ability doesn't just give people stretchy arms. It lets us channel energy too! That's how we charge our Arms and perform Rush attacks!
You probably already know this, but most people with the ARMS Ability join a specialized fighting league known as "ARMS League" -- creative name, I know. I'm pretty well-known as one of its fighters.

If you've ever seen Spring Man's Toasters, those are just like my Sparkies, except those heat up with flames when charged! They're a favorite of a lot of fighters, but Sparkies just work better for me!

If you've ever seen Ninjara's Buffs, they're really similar to my Sparkies, except those have no element. Instead, they have some homing power and puff up when charged! They're actually great for my fighting style, but I prefer having an element on my side.

I'm not sure how, but Arms can actually change size with the fighter's arms, so fighters like Min Min and Misango don't have to worry when they use their arm-enhancing powers. I'll definitely have to ask someone how they do that...

Have you ever seen Helix use his Blorbs? I used them once, and they feel really weird to punch with. Imagine having your hand bounce around on the ground while your arm wiggles behind it -- that's what it's like!

You might've noticed the bird-type Arms some fighers use, but what you might not have noticed is the little bird's nest it has on the glove. I don't think it does anything, but those little chicks inside are so cute!
I really like the look of the Megatons -- those big purple ones Master Mummy uses. It's too bad I'm not much good with heavyweight Arms! They slow me down too much for my fighting style.

By the way, have you ever seen those green nets that come out whenever an ARMS fighter goes for a grab? That's a feature on all Arms! Its pattern is customizable, too -- I made mine look like ribbons, of course!
By the way, "Poison" Arms aren't actually poisonous -- at least, not the deadly kind. They're actually more like "Tranquilizer" Arms, making the target sluggish and sleepy.
I heard there are some people out there selling unsanctioned Arms. They all sound interesting, but I worry about how safe they are, having not gone through ARMS Labs for testing...
In case you were wondering, yes, these ribbons are my actual hair! Some people think it's a wig, but nope, it's a side-effect of the ARMS Ability!
I'm not sure I enjoyed my match against Byte. Knocking out a robot is a weird thing -- I was worried I broke something in him when I knocked him out!
Have you ever seen Lola Pop do her inflation trick? I've always wondered if that trick only affects her clothes or if she actually inflates, but she won't tell me!
Have you ever seen a fight at Spring Stadium? I love doing fights there! The springs are so much fun!
I know it sounds mean, but Helix is actually kind of fun to punch. He's so jiggly! I need to get a punching bag made from the same slime!
Did you know that Kid Cobra was born with the ARMS Ability? That has a 1 in 100,000 chance of happening! I bet he understands how to use the power better than most!
Ever wonder how ARMS fighters recover from matches so quickly? We drink a special sports drink called "HP Juice!" It tastes a little funny, but you can't argue with results!
By the way, I just want to inform you that ARMS League has a version of volleyball played with bombs and a version of basketball where players dunk each other! I'm not kidding! Isn't that crazy!
I don't suppose you brought your pogo stick just to show us a trick, ~player~?
Y'know, they say working out in the nude is a healthy practice. Maybe we can arrange some nude workout sessions at my in-home gym?
In case you were wondering, there aren't any, uh, naughty Arms. A-at least, none that I know of...

People keep asking if I ever do anything naughty with the ARMS Ability, but I'm not sure what answer they're expecting. There isn't really anything to do with it -- unless you like being tied up, but I don't.
To be honest, I've been wanting to try out pole dancing. It looks like fun, and I've heard its a great workout, too!

Say, we could totally play strip V-Ball if we wanted to. The net separates both teams, so we wouldn't need uniforms to tell them apart. You don't need the ARMS Ability to play, either, so we could all play!
To be honest, I get tired of wearing this mask all the time. I wish they could put the same technology in a necklace or something so I can let my face breath.

I actually need to work on my energy-channeling ability. I can only hold a charge for a little bit -- which isn't bad, but not as good as someone like Spring Man or Kid Cobra. I should see if one of them can help me improve...
Y'know, if it weren't for the need to uphold my image, I wouldn't mind... doing more sexual stuff. If my body can make people happy, then I'd be happy do more with it...
I bet it'd feel pretty freeing to use my floating power while naked... I-- I think I'll stay grounded for now, though...
Say, does this place have any spaces for regular strip performances -- no cards involved? I wouldn't mind putting on some special shows here every now and then.
Did you catch these little ribbons on my wrists, by the way? They're part of my arms -- and honestly? Probably my favorite part of my body.
Say, what kind of Arm would you like to see get made? Y'know, think a glove that's also a weapon or tool.
So, what brings out your competitive side? I'll be honest, I can't help but be competitive at every game I play!
Ooh, that sounds cool! Why the "claw," though? You don't have a claw.
I don't go by "Spring-Arms" because my arms are made of ribbons. Spring Man has spring arms, but not me.
Wait, you mean you lost your Arms Ability? That's so weird!
Hmm... How about "Lady Dread?"
Oh, an explanation is easy: I have the ARMS ability! It gives me stretchy arms!
Whether you believe it or not, I am a boxer, and I've got enough fans to where your jeering means nothing to me!
Thank you, ~other~. I designed it myself, and it was manufactured by my sponser, Billy!
Thank you, ~other~. That's exactly what I was going for when I designed it, and since Billy manufactured it, that's exactly what it is! Tough and pretty!
I'm also a pop star, ~other~. I'm surprised you've never heard of me.
Heh heh, I get that a lot. That's why I became a pop star!
Thank you, ~other~! I try my best!
Well, ribbons are kind of my thing, and "Ribbon Girl" is easy to remember!
Trainer? Uh, I could probably teach you how to box if you wanted to learn, but I wouldn't call myself a trainer.
I don't mind at all, Perona. In fact, I already have a line of plushies with my likeness! A lot of us ARMS fighters do! Helix even has sodas made in his likeness!
Sorry, no, I'm not Twintelle. I'm Ribbon Girl!
Maybe. There's more than one of us punch girls, you know! If it's Ribbon Girl you're thinking of, that's me!
I guess this Luffy of yours also has the ARMS Ability?
Not only did I pick it, I designed it myself! I went for a balance between sporty and cute!
